title: Which Apple announcements are you most looking forward to during WWDC 2022?
content:
Apple’s WWDC 2022 keynote already has an announced date: June 6. In a couple of months from now, the Cupertino company will likely unveil iOS 16, iPadOS 16, macOS 13, watchOS 9, tvOS 16, and (maybe) even more. Which Apple announcements are you most looking forward to during WWDC 2022?

more…

The post Which Apple announcements are you most looking forward to during WWDC 2022? appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple's WWDC 2022 keynote already has a date. Which announcements are you most looking forward to from the company.
